Title: Illegal Use of Joe Zopp
Writer: Scott Brown (story and screenplay), Seth Hedrington (story), Paul Hogseth (story), Nick Holle (story and screenplay), Joe Ott (story), Sarah Rykal (story and screenplay), Emery Skolfield (story)
Actors: Nick Holle, Andre Egli, Corey Walton, Michael Cook
Plot: Joe Zopp returns to his hometown to unravel the mystery of his own death.
